doc:
Chuck Hayward https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chuck_Hayward 0 Charles Bert Hayward (January 20, 1920 – February 23, 1998) was an American motion picture stuntman and actor. He was associated particularly with the films of John Wayne. He doubled for most of the great Western and action stars of the 1950s-1980s. Charles_Bert_Hayward ( January_20_,_1920 – February_23_,_1998 ) was an_American_motion_picture_stuntman_and_actor . He was_associated particularly with the_films of John_Wayne . He doubled for_most of the_great_Western_and_action_stars of the_1950s-1980s .
